name: Character
description: Characters represents Actors which can be possessed, can move and interact with world. They are the default Skeletal Mesh Character built for nanos world.

functions.name: ApplyDamage
functions.description: Do damage to a character
functions.description_long: Do damage to a character, will trigger all related events and apply modified damage based on bone. Also will apply impulse if it's a heavy explosion

parameters.name: instigator
parameters.description: The player which caused the damage

parameters.name: causer
parameters.description: The object which caused the damage

functions.name: AddSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Spawns and Attaches a SkeletalMesh into this Character
functions.description_long:
Spawns and Attaches a SkeletalMesh into this Character, the SkeletalMesh must have the same Skeletal used by the Character Mesh, and will follow all animations from it. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing it further.

For customizing the Materials specific of a SkeletalMeshAttached, please use the following syntax in the Paintable methods: attachable///[ATTACHABLE_ID]/[PARAMETER_NAME], where [ATTACHABLE_ID] is the ID of the Attachable, and [PARAMETER_NAME] is the name of the parameter you want to change.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Used further for removing or applying material settings on it

functions.name: AddStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Spawns and Attaches a StaticMesh into this Character
functions.description_long:
Spawns and Attaches a StaticMesh into this Character in a Socket with relative Location and Rotation. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing it further

For customizing the Materials specific of a StaticMeshAttached, please use the following syntax as the parameter_name in the Paintable methods: attachable///[ATTACHABLE_ID]/[PARAMETER_NAME], where [ATTACHABLE_ID] is the ID of the Attachable, and [PARAMETER_NAME] is the name of the parameter you want to change.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Used further for removing or applying material settings on it

functions.name: Drop
functions.description: Drops any Pickable the Character is holding

functions.name: EnterVehicle
functions.description: Enters the Vehicle at Seat (0 - Driver)

functions.name: GrabProp
functions.description: Gives a Prop to the Character

functions.name: HideBone
functions.description: Hides a bone of this Character
functions.description_long:
Hides a bone of this Character.

Check Bone Names List

functions.name: UnHideBone
functions.description: UnHide a bone of this Character
functions.description_long:
UnHide a bone of this Character.

Check Bone Names List

functions.name: IsBoneHidden
functions.description: Gets if a bone is hidden

functions.name: Jump
functions.description: Triggers this Character to jump

functions.name: LeaveVehicle
functions.description: Leaves the current Vehicle

functions.name: LookAt
functions.description: AI: Tries to make this Character to look at Location

functions.name: MoveTo
functions.description: AI: Makes this Character to walk to the Location
functions.description_long:
AI: Makes this Character to walk to the Location

Triggers event MoveCompleted

functions.name: Follow
functions.description: AI: Makes this Character to follow another actor
functions.description_long:
AI: Makes this Character to follow another actor

Triggers event MoveCompleted

parameters.name: stop_on_succeed
parameters.description: Whether to stop when reaching the target

parameters.name: stop_on_fail
parameters.description: Whether to stop when failed to reach the target

parameters.name: update_rate
parameters.description: How often to recalculate the AI path

functions.name: StopMovement
functions.description: AI: Stops the movement

functions.name: PickUp
functions.description: Gives a Melee/Grenade/Weapon (Pickable) to the Character

functions.name: PlayAnimation
functions.description: Plays an Animation Montage on this character

parameters.name: stop_all_montages
parameters.description: Stops all running Montages from the same Group

functions.name: RemoveSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if existing, a SkeletalMesh from this Character given it's custom ID

functions.name: RemoveStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if existing, a StaticMesh from this Character given it's custom ID

functions.name: RemoveAllStaticMeshesAttached
functions.description: Removes all StaticMeshes attached

functions.name: RemoveAllSkeletalMeshesAttached
functions.description: Removes all SkeletalMeshes attached

functions.name: Respawn
functions.description: Respawns the Character, fullying it's Health and moving it to it's Initial Location

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: If not passed will use the initial location passed when the Character spawned

functions.name: SetAnimationIdleWalkRunStanding
functions.description: Sets the Blend Space (2D) Animation for Standing
functions.description_long:
Sets the Blend Space (2D) Animation for Standing

Horizontal Axis stands for Speed X and Vertical Axis for Speed Y

functions.name: SetAnimationIdleWalkRunCrouching
functions.description:
Sets the Blend Space (2D) Animation for Crouching

Horizontal Axis stands for Speed X and Vertical Axis for Speed Y

functions.name: SetAnimationIdleWalkRunProning
functions.description:
Sets the Blend Space (2D) Animation for Proning

Horizontal Axis stands for Speed X and Vertical Axis for Speed Y

functions.name: SetAnimationsTransitionStandingCrouching
functions.description: Sets the Transition Animation between Standing and Crouching

functions.name: SetAnimationsTransitionCrouchingProning
functions.description: Sets the Transition Animation between Crouching and Proning

functions.name: SetAccelerationSettings
functions.description: Sets the Movement Max Acceleration of this Character

functions.name: SetBrakingSettings
functions.description: Sets the Movement Braking Settings of this Character

functions.name: SetCameraMode
functions.description: Sets the Camera Mode
functions.description_long:
Sets the Camera Mode (i.e. Only TPS, FPS or if allow both)

Using FPSOnly CameraMode on AI will lock his body rotation (when using LookAt)

functions.name: SetCameraOffset
functions.description: Sets the Camera Offset (only affects TPS)

functions.name: SetCanCrouch
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Crouch and to Prone

functions.name: SetCanAim
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Aim

functions.name: SetCanDrop
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Drop the Picked up item

functions.name: SetCanJump
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Jump

functions.name: SetCanDive
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Dive

functions.name: SetCanSprint
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Sprint

functions.name: SetCanGrabProps
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Grab any Prop

functions.name: SetCanPickupPickables
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Pick up any Pickable (Weapon, Grenade, Melee...)

functions.name: SetCanPunch
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to Punch

functions.name: SetCanDeployParachute
functions.description: Sets if this Character is allowed to deploy the Parachute

functions.name: SetCapsuleSize
functions.description: Sets this Character's Capsule size
functions.description_long: Sets this Character's Capsule size (will affect Camera location and Character's collision)

functions.name: SetDamageMultiplier
functions.description: Changes how much damage this character takes on specific bones

functions.name: SetDeathSound
functions.description: Changes the Death sound when Character dies

functions.name: SetFallDamageTaken
functions.description: Set the Fall Damage multiplier taken when falling from High places
functions.description_long:
Set the Fall Damage multiplier taken when falling from High places.

Setting to 0 will make the Character to do not take any damage

functions.name: SetFlyingMode
functions.description: Sets the Flying Mode

functions.name: SetFOVMultiplier
functions.description: Sets the Field of View multiplier

functions.name: SetHighFallingTime
functions.description: Sets time to transition to HighFalling state
functions.description_long:
Sets time elapsed until automatically transition to HighFalling state (from SmallFalling) in seconds

Set it to -1 to never enter HighFalling time and consequently do not ragdoll when falling

functions.name: SetGaitMode
functions.description: Sets the Gait Mode

functions.name: SetGravityScale
functions.description: Changes the Gravity Scale
functions.description_long: Changes the Gravity Scale of this Character (can be negative)

functions.name: SetHealth
functions.description: Sets the Health of this Character
functions.description_long: Sets the Health of this Character. You can only call it on alive characters (call Respawn first)

functions.name: SetImpactDamageTaken
functions.description: Set the Impact Damage taken when being roamed by things
functions.description_long:
Set the Impact Damage taken when being roamed by things.

Setting to 0 will make the Character to do not take damage or enter ragdoll mode

functions.name: SetInvulnerable
functions.description: Sets if the Character can receive any damage

functions.name: SetJumpZVelocity
functions.description: Sets the velocity of the jump

functions.name: SetMaxHealth
functions.description: Sets the MaxHealth of this Character

functions.name: SetMesh
functions.description: Changes the Character Mesh on the fly

functions.name: SetMorphTarget
functions.description: Set Morph Target with Name and Value

functions.name: GetMorphTarget
functions.description: Returns the value of a Morph Target

functions.name: ClearMorphTargets
functions.description: Clear all Morph Target that are set to this Mesh

functions.name: GetAllMorphTargetNames
functions.description: Returns a table with all morph targets available

return.description: table with all morph targets available

functions.name: SetPhysicalAnimationSettings
functions.description: Applies the physical animation settings to the body given

parameters.name: bone
parameters.description: The body we will be driving

parameters.name: include_self
parameters.description: Whether to modify the given body

parameters.name: is_local_simulation
parameters.description: Whether the drive targets are in world space or local

parameters.name: orientation_strength
parameters.description: The strength used to correct orientation error

parameters.name: angular_velocity_strength
parameters.description: The strength used to correct angular velocity error

parameters.name: position_strength
parameters.description: The strength used to correct linear position error. Only used for non-local simulation

parameters.name: velocity_strength
parameters.description: The strength used to correct linear velocity error. Only used for non-local simulation

parameters.name: max_linear_force
parameters.description: The max force used to correct linear errors

parameters.name: max_angular_force
parameters.description: The max force used to correct angular errors

functions.name: ResetPhysicalAnimationSettings
functions.description: Resets all Physical Animation settings

functions.name: SetInputEnabled
functions.description: Enables/Disables Character's Input

functions.name: SetParachuteTexture
functions.description: Changes the Parachute Texture

functions.name: SetPainSound
functions.description: Changes the Pain sound when Character takes damage

functions.name: SetPunchDamage
functions.description: Set the Punch Damage this Character will apply on others

functions.name: SetRagdollMode
functions.description: Sets Character Ragdoll Mode

functions.name: SetSimulatePhysics
functions.description: Sets the Character Capsule to simulate physics

functions.name: SetSpeedMultiplier
functions.description: Sets all speed multiplier

functions.name: SetStanceMode
functions.description: Sets the Stance Mode

functions.name: SetTeam
functions.description: Sets a Team which will disable damaging same Team Members

functions.name: SetViewMode
functions.description: Sets the View Mode

functions.name: SetWeaponAimMode
functions.description: Sets the Weapon's Aim Mode

functions.name: UnGrabProp

events.name: AnimationBeginNotify
events.description: When an Animation Montage Notify begins

events.name: AnimationEndNotify
events.description: When an Animation Montage Notify ends

events.name: Attack
events.description: Triggered when the Character effectively attacks with a Melee

events.name: Death
events.description: When Character Dies

arguments.name: causer
arguments.description: The object which caused the damage

events.name: Drop
events.description: When Character drops the currently picked up Pickable

events.name: EnterVehicle
events.description: When Character enters a vehicle

events.name: AttemptEnterVehicle
events.description: Triggered when a Character attempts to enter a vehicle

events.name: FallingModeChange
events.description: Called when FallingMode changes

events.name: Fire
events.description: When Character fires a Weapon

events.name: GaitModeChange
events.description: Called when GaitMode changes

events.name: GrabProp
events.description: When Character grabs up a Prop

events.name: HealthChange
events.description: When Character has it's Health changed, or because took damage or manually set through scripting or respawning

events.name: Highlight
events.description: When Character highlights/looks at a Prop or a Pickable

arguments.name: is_highlighted
arguments.description: Whether the object is being highlighted or not

events.description: Triggered when a Character interacts with a Prop or Pickable

events.name: LeaveVehicle
events.description: When Character leaves a vehicle

events.name: AttemptLeaveVehicle

events.name: MoveComplete
events.description: Called when AI reaches it's destination, or when it fails

events.name: PickUp
events.description: When Character picks up anything

events.name: Possess
events.description: When Character is possessed

events.name: Punch
events.description: When Character punches

events.name: RagdollModeChange

events.name: AttemptReload
events.description: Triggered when this Character attempts to reload

events.name: Reload
events.description: When Character reloads a weapon

events.name: Respawn
events.description: When Character Respawns

events.name: StanceModeChange
events.description: Called when StanceMode changes

events.name: SwimmingModeChange
events.description: Called when Swimming Mode changes

events.name: TakeDamage
events.description: Triggered when this Character takes damage

arguments.name: from_direction
arguments.description: Direction of the damage relative to the damaged actor

arguments.name: instigator
arguments.description: The player which caused the damage

arguments.name: causer
arguments.description: The object which caused the damage

return.description: Return false to cancel the damage (will still display animations, particles and apply impact forces)

events.name: UnGrabProp
events.description: When Character drops a Prop

events.name: UnPossess
events.description: When Character is unpossessed

events.name: ViewModeChange
events.description: When Character changes it's View Mode

events.name: WeaponAimModeChange
events.description: Called when Weapon Aim Mode changes

events.name: PullUse
events.description: Triggered when a Character presses the use button for a Pickable (i.e. clicks left mouse button with this equipped)

arguments.name: pickable
arguments.description: The Pickable which has just been used

events.name: ReleaseUse
events.description: Triggered when a Character releases the use button for a Pickable (i.e. releases left mouse button with this equipped)

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Character that stopped using it

arguments.name: pickable
arguments.description: The Pickable which has just stopped being used
